column4: can any one tell me if there is a way to install Ubuntu 5,10 totally from floppy disk?
Ubotu can you tell me if there is a way to do a total install of 5.10 from floppy disk?
I'm reading it now
I need to do it toally from floppy disk
5.10 is the version I need to install
I know about smart boot and Toms
I have 9 years
I really need to do it that way
you have a network card?
scsi cd should work
the BIOS doesn't allow booting from SCSI
you can get a disk, that will do that for you
a floppy disk
you boot off a floppy, that in turn boots off the cd
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SmartBootManagerHowto
I have been there
that doesn't tell me how to put Ubuntu on floppys
the file you are tying to put on a floppy is to big.  it will not fit.
I understand that but there should be some way to span mutiple floppies
you can, but you would have to brake it up, and then you can not run the code
have you also looked in your scsi controler at boot up?
how big is your hard drive?
